comment.author: 56789833@N07
comment._content: Kawau should have capital K (Kawau Island); Sir G Grey, not Sri. (Governor of NZ.)

comment.author: 92660892@N08
comment._content:
This photo should be renamed Mansion House, Kawau Island, Hauraki Gulf Auckland. Kawau Island was bought in 1862 by Sir George GREY, Governor and later Premier of NZ, and he re-built Mansion House.
If this photo is dated 1923, by that time it was owned by my grand-parents Lawford and Kathleen REEVES.
Ref: WILSON, Nora Creina: Memories of Mansion House 1980, Richards Publishing, Auckland NZ
